description: '''Mary Hopkin''' (born 3 May 1950), credited on some recordings as '''Mary Visconti''' from her marriage to [[Tony Visconti]], is a Welsh singer best known for her 1968 UK number 1 single "[[Those Were the Days (song)|Those Were the Days]]". She was one of the first artists to be signed to [[the Beatles]]' [[Apple Records|Apple]] label.
